peebee.transforms.convert_to_frame(fr)

Helper file for peebee, holds the decorators for functions. These are used to help automate things like array-like vs float handling in function inputs, alternate between Cartesian and Galactic frames, etc. This doesn’t need to show up in Sphinx.

peebee.glob.fix_arrays(func)
